description:
All videos in PyCon Korea 2022 have subtitles so that everyone can access the presentations regardless of hearing ability. 
Please turn on the subtitle view setting. (Language: Korean) 

See more details about the PyCon Korea 2022 program: https://2022.pycon.kr/program/talks

related_urls.label: Migrating large Python projects to a monorepo using Pantsbuild

title: Migrating large Python projects to a monorepo using Pantsbuild
